verses.verse: When Rachel <S%H7354><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that she bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> no children, <S%H7354><s%> Rachel envied <S%H7065><s%> her sister. <S%H269><s%> She said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> me children, <S%H1121><s%> or else <S%H369><s%> I will die. <S%H4191><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Am I in God <S%H430><s%>'s place, <S%H4513><s%> who has withheld from you the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the womb? <S%H990><s%>"

She said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H519><s%> my maid Bilhah. <S%H1090><s%> Go in <S%H935><s%> to her, <S%H3205><s%> that she may bear on my knees, <S%H1290><s%> and I also may obtain children by her. <S%H1129><s%>"
She gave <S%H5414><s%> him Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> her handmaid <S%H8198><s%> as wife, <S%H802><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went in to her. <S%H935><s%>
Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>

Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has judged <S%H1777><s%> me, <S%H8085><s%> and has also heard my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and has given <S%H5414><s%> me a son. <S%H1121><s%>" Therefore called <S%H7121><s%> she his name <S%H8034><s%> Dan. <S%H1835><s%>
Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%>'s handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H3205><s%> and bore Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "With mighty <S%H430><s%> wrestlings <S%H5319><s%> have I wrestled <S%H6617><s%> with my sister, <S%H269><s%> and have prevailed. <S%H3201><s%>" She named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>

When Leah <S%H3812><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had finished <S%H5975><s%> bearing, <S%H3205><s%> she took <S%H3947><s%> Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> her handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> her to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> as a wife. <S%H802><s%>
Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%>'s handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%>
Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "How <S%H1409><s%> fortunate! <S%H935><s%>" She named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Gad. <S%H1410><s%>
Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%>'s handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>
Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Happy am I, <S%H837><s%> for the daughters <S%H1323><s%> will call me happy. <S%H833><s%>" She named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Asher. <S%H836><s%>

Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went in <S%H3212><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> mandrakes <S%H1736><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to his mother, <S%H517><s%> Leah. <S%H3812><s%> Then Rachel <S%H7354><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Leah, <S%H3812><s%> "Please give me <S%H5414><s%> some of your son <S%H1121><s%>'s mandrakes. <S%H1736><s%>"

She said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H4592><s%> "Is it a small matter that you have taken <S%H3947><s%> away my husband? <S%H376><s%> Would you take away <S%H3947><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%>'s mandrakes, <S%H1736><s%> also? <S%H7354><s%>" Rachel said, <S%H559><s%> "Therefore he will lie <S%H7901><s%> with you tonight <S%H3915><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%>'s mandrakes. <S%H1736><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from the field <S%H7704><s%> in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> and Leah <S%H3812><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> and said, "You must come in <S%H935><s%> to me; <S%H7936><s%> for I have surely hired <S%H7936><s%> you with my son <S%H1121><s%>'s mandrakes. <S%H1736><s%>" He lay <S%H7901><s%> with her that night. <S%H3915><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> listened to Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>
Leah said, "God has given me my hire, because I gave my handmaid to my husband." She named him Issachar.
Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H3205><s%> and bore a sixth <S%H8345><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

Leah <S%H3812><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has endowed <S%H2064><s%> me with a good <S%H2896><s%> dowry. <S%H2065><s%> Now <S%H6471><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%> will live <S%H2082><s%> with me, <S%H3205><s%> because I have borne him six <S%H8337><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>" She named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>
Afterwards, <S%H310><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> a daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and named <S%H8034><s%> her <S%H7121><s%> Dinah. <S%H1783><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to her, <S%H6605><s%> and opened her womb. <S%H7358><s%>
She conceived, <S%H2029><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has taken away <S%H622><s%> my reproach. <S%H2781><s%>"
She named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "May Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> add <S%H3254><s%> another <S%H312><s%> son to me. <S%H1121><s%>"

It happened, <S%H7354><s%> when Rachel had borne <S%H3205><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> "Send me away, <S%H7971><s%> that I may go <S%H3212><s%> to my own place, <S%H4725><s%> and to my country. <S%H776><s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> me my wives <S%H802><s%> and my children <S%H3206><s%> for <S%H2004><s%> whom I have served <S%H5647><s%> you, <S%H3212><s%> and let me go; for you know <S%H3045><s%> my service <S%H5656><s%> with which I have served you. <S%H5647><s%>"

Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H4672><s%> "If now I have found favor <S%H2580><s%> in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> stay here, <S%H5172><s%> for I have divined that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> me for your sake. <S%H1558><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Appoint <S%H5344><s%> me your wages, <S%H7939><s%> and I will give it. <S%H5414><s%>"
He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3045><s%> "You know how <S%H834><s%> I have served <S%H5647><s%> you, <S%H834><s%> and how your livestock have fared with me. <S%H4735><s%>

For it was little <S%H4592><s%> which you had before I <S%H6440><s%> came, <S%H6555><s%> and it has increased to a multitude. <S%H7230><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you wherever I turned. <S%H7272><s%> Now when <S%H4970><s%> will I provide <S%H6213><s%> for my own house also? <S%H1004><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "What shall I give you? <S%H5414><s%>" Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "You <S%H5414><s%> shall not give <S%H5414><s%> me anything. <S%H6213><s%> If you will do this thing <S%H1697><s%> for me, <S%H7725><s%> I will again feed <S%H7462><s%> your flock <S%H6629><s%> and keep it. <S%H8104><s%>

I will pass <S%H5674><s%> through all your flock <S%H6629><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> removing <S%H5493><s%> from there every speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> one, <S%H7716><s%> and every black <S%H2345><s%> one <S%H7716><s%> among the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> and the spotted <S%H2921><s%> and speckled <S%H5348><s%> among the goats. <S%H5795><s%> This will be my hire. <S%H7939><s%>

So my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> will answer <S%H6030><s%> for me hereafter, <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H4279><s%> you come <S%H935><s%> concerning my hire <S%H7939><s%> that is before you. <S%H6440><s%> Every one <S%H3605><s%> that is not speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted <S%H2921><s%> among the goats, <S%H5795><s%> and black <S%H2345><s%> among the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> that might be with me, <S%H1589><s%> will be counted stolen."
Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H3863><s%> let it be according to your word. <S%H1697><s%>"

That day, <S%H3117><s%> he removed <S%H5493><s%> the male goats <S%H8495><s%> that were streaked <S%H6124><s%> and spotted, <S%H2921><s%> and all the female goats <S%H5795><s%> that were speckled <S%H5348><s%> and spotted, <S%H2921><s%> every one that had white <S%H3836><s%> in it, <S%H2345><s%> and all the black ones among the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

He set <S%H7760><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> between himself and Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> fed <S%H7462><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%>'s flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> to himself rods <S%H4731><s%> of fresh <S%H3892><s%> poplar, <S%H3839><s%> almond, <S%H3869><s%> plane tree, <S%H6196><s%> peeled <S%H6478><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> streaks <S%H6479><s%> in them, <S%H3836><s%> and made the white appear <S%H4286><s%> which was in the rods. <S%H4731><s%>

He set <S%H3322><s%> the rods <S%H4731><s%> which he had peeled <S%H6478><s%> opposite <S%H6478><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> in the gutters <S%H7298><s%> in the <S%H4325><s%> watering-troughs <S%H8268><s%> where the flocks <S%H6629><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%> They conceived <S%H3179><s%> when they came <S%H935><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

The flocks <S%H6629><s%> conceived <S%H3179><s%> before the rods, <S%H4731><s%> and the flocks <S%H6629><s%> produced <S%H3205><s%> streaked, <S%H6124><s%> speckled, <S%H5348><s%> and spotted. <S%H2921><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> separated <S%H6504><s%> the lambs, <S%H3775><s%> and set <S%H5414><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the flocks <S%H6629><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the streaked <S%H6124><s%> and all the black <S%H2345><s%> in the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban: <S%H3837><s%> and he put <S%H7896><s%> his own droves <S%H5739><s%> apart, <S%H7896><s%> and didn't put them into Laban <S%H3837><s%>'s flock. <S%H6629><s%>

It happened, <S%H7194><s%> whenever the stronger of the flock <S%H6629><s%> conceived, <S%H3179><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> laid <S%H7760><s%> the rods <S%H4731><s%> before the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> in the gutters, <S%H7298><s%> that they might conceive <S%H3179><s%> among the rods; <S%H4731><s%>

but when the flock <S%H6629><s%> were feeble, <S%H5848><s%> he didn't <S%H7760><s%> put them in. So the feebler <S%H5848><s%> were Laban <S%H3837><s%>'s, and the stronger <S%H7194><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s.

The man <S%H376><s%> increased <S%H6555><s%> exceedingly, <S%H3966><s%> and had large <S%H7227><s%> flocks, <S%H6629><s%> female servants <S%H8198><s%> and male servants, <S%H5650><s%> and camels <S%H1581><s%> and donkeys. <S%H2543><s%>
